section_title: PROVISION OF FINANCIAL AND TECHNICAL SUPPORT:
sentences: This issue was first taken up in plenary on 19 May , with the G-77/China and AOSIS emphasizing the importance of addressing financial, technical and institutional constraints.
The issue was then forwarded to informal consultations conducted by Ojoo-Massawa and Bersee.
The SBI adopted conclusions on this item on 25 May .
enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
